fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
-Imprison (Day): Choose a player. They will be hauled off to jail, roleblocking them and bypassing roleblock immunity. They will be given Powerful defense.
-Execute (Night): Execute your target. 3 uses.
-Kidnap (Night): Kidnap a target and keep them in jail the entire next day, blocking them from seeing the next day chat. 1 use.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value: You may speak to your jailed and kidnapped target. You and the Unseen will hear your target.
